content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'ocde_groupeocde_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ocde_groupeocde_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.cotisationsecu (
	[PAYS] nvarchar(4000),
	[ANNEE] nvarchar(4000),
	[COTISATION_SECU(%PIB)] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'argent/cotisationsecu/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [ocde_groupeocde_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.cotisationsecu
GO
